thread.title: ISL 2: Chennaiyin's Materazzi dedicates victory to Amitabh Bachchan
thread.title_full: ISL 2: Chennaiyin's Materazzi dedicates victory to Amitabh Bachchan - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: ISL 2: Chennaiyin's Materazzi dedicates victory to Amitabh Bachchan
text:
Chennaiyin FC coach Marco Materazzi today dedicated his side's 4-0 win over FC Goa in a third round match of the Indian Super League football tournament here to Bollywood superstar Amitabh Bachchan , the father of club co-owner Abhishek.*Amitabh Bachchan*
"It was a fantastic win, my boys combined as a team. I have worked on our ... Â»
